full_summary:
Tender Notice: Breeches, Blue, Unisex
=====================================

**Request for Information (RFI) Notice**

**Notice ID:** PW-__PR-771-81426
**Solicitation Number:** M7594-224583/A
**Closing Date:** 2022-11-10T14:00:00

**Procurement Summary**

Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) on behalf of the Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) is issuing a Request for Information (RFI) for the supply of Breeches, Blue, Unisex.

**Notice Contact Information**

* Name: Nathalie Ferron
* Email: [nathalie.ferron@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:nathalie.ferron@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
* Phone: (***)
* Address: L'Esplanade Laurier, East Tower 7th Floor, Tour est 7e étage, 140 O'Connor, rue O'Connor, Ottawa, Ontario, K1 A 0R5 Canada

**Notice Details**

The RCMP requires a firm quantity of 2,550 Breeches, Blue, Unisex conforming to RCMP Specification No: G.S. 1045-078 dated November 15, 2021. The requirement includes three (3) options of 1,020 breeches, as well as special orders of 810 breeches that can be exercised within 12, 24, and 36 months of contract award. This requirement is limited to Canadian goods, in accordance with Article 503.4 (b) of the Canadian Free Trade Agreement.

**Procurement Method**

The procurement will occur in two phases: Phase 1 (RFI) and Phase 2 (Request for Proposal). Interested bidders who submit a duly completed Submission of Interest form will receive a copy of the Request for Proposal, specifications, and other associated documentation.

**Evaluation Criteria**

The evaluation process will be based on the lowest price.

**Language of Procurement**

The procurement will be conducted in either English or French, at the option of the bidder.

**Additional Information**

All enquires related to this notice must be addressed in writing to Nathalie Ferron at [nathalie.ferron@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:nathalie.ferron@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca).
